root: ^Oh my goodness Jade! Are you okay?

main: ^I think so! I'm just uncomfortable in these chains. Help a girl out?
^Ah! Thank you. God, I hate crazy people. And this crazy ugly house. I was so bored sitting here I ripped this
^article off the wall and read the whole thing. It's super creepy, you should hear it.

c-1: ^Who cares about some random paper? You're out now, we should get moving.
^That creep kept it for a reason! Just listen:

note: ^Community members are left on edge after the disappearance of 12-year old Russel Stewart.
^A lack of leads has left authorities shaken. Friends last saw Russel at a local park near the woods, but he
^never returned home. A close friend of the missing boy claims to have witnessed a strange figure near the
^woods on the day of the disappearance, though authorities could not substantiate his claims.
^“It's out there,” his friend was quoted as saying. “And one day, it'll pay for what it did to Russel.”

c-0: ^Wow this article is 24 years old, why does this maniac have this?
^He must think one of us is this.. creature he saw. He wouldn't stop asking me if I was hungry.
^Who cares what he believes? We need to escape, and that's all.
c-1: ^That must've been his friend... I see why he lost his mind.
^That's what I think! Maybe we could reason with him. We're just kids. We had nothing to do with this.

c-0: ^Look around, Jade. He's not above kidnapping, who knows what else he'll do? Let's go.
c-1: ^Jade... I don't know. We can try if that's what it comes down to. Let's focus on getting out without getting caught.

g-0: ^Ok... we can do this. Keep your head on a swivel, I think I hear him walking around somewhere. YOUR CURRENT EVIL LEVEL:
